review: Great device ... easy to install and use.

review: Takes some time to set up, but other than that it meets all expectations
author: Juan Acosta

review: works pretty good. Wish more apps for ipad. My son's chromebook works great with chromecast.

review: Great, would be better if it could stream all internet videos.

review: Really helped improve my understanding of the Chromecast potential.Fills the void of having to re-invent the power of this little gadget.Will help me stream some content on the big TV that I have wanted a for long time.
author: Ron-O

review: It is a great buy for the price, the features are full but needs more cross compatibility with other products.
author: Zachary G.
